text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Mr. President do you know that electricity shock can kill a virus in a human body but what should be the voltage with that I am not sure need to be tested. Because electricity produces heat to our body and coronavirus can not survive to a place where the heat exist.#JustinTrudeau
